rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer that respects Vastu principles by aligning the main door to the east, ensuring a positive flow of energy.
A spacious living area that incorporates Chettinad-style elements with intricate detailing and traditional motifs.
A modern kitchen designed in the Chettinad style with local design aesthetics and efficient layout, ensuring proper ventilation from the west side.
A dedicated workspace with sound insulation and ample natural light from the east window to enhance productivity.
A serene reading and study room designed with Vastu principles, ensuring a calming environment through soft lighting and wooden elements.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligning with Vastu principles.
Allows natural light to enter and supports positive energy flow.
Provides ventilation and respects the plot's west-facing aspect, as per local norms.
Seamless integration with living area while ensuring privacy.
